column9: After a busy few hours we decided to have an ice cream.We asked a young lady which was the best place and she said Annikas Cafe Och Glassbar..She was right it was  to die for. I am  an ice cream junkie And thought I had...More

After trying the ice cream bar in the main square and being highly disappointed due to the chemical taste of otherwise watery ice creams (even the cream-based ones), I gave a go to this small place. Only a few flavours but DIVINE. I recommend the...More

column7: Nice place for homemade ice cream
column9: Great place for ice cream. Not as many flavors as the place on the square, but just as good, and almost no waiting in line.
Supergod glass och generösa kulor och mjukglass. Dessutom supergullig personal och nära till allmänna sittplatser.
